name: Niox Parkour (Alpha)
description:
[Movement Keys]

W - Forward

A - Left

S - Back

D - Right

Left Mouse Click - Drag Blocks

Wallrun - Hold "A" and Jump near a wall to Wallrun

[End]

Hello and Welcome to my first ever game lol, this is my first creation ever and I'm still testing ideas out, if you find any bugs please add me on discord so I can try and fix them.

for now, there's isn't much I can say about the game, give it a try!

add me on discord if you wanna chat with me, or check out my YouTube channel:

https://www.youtube.com/c/xnioxyt

Discord server: https://discord.gg/AATjAP9

Discord: xNioxYT#4796

Avoid Red blocks and try to make it to the end!

[Block functions]

Red and Yellow - Kill you

Orange - Pickable blocks that kill you

White - Pickable blocks that you can walk on

Brown and Gray - Non-Pickable blocks that you can walk on

[End]
